Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '83'. Name Peisistratos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR P.16128.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (221)
